events.name: CartItemAdded
events.description: New item addition to the cart for enhanced customer experience.

events.name: CartItemRemoved
events.description: Allow customers to easily remove items from their cart.

events.name: CartDiscountApplied
events.description: Facilitate promotional discounts directly in the shopping cart.

events.name: CartSaved
events.description: Enable users to save their cart for later purchases.

events.name: CartGiftOptionAdded
events.description: Allow customers to mark items as gifts.

events.name: CartItemQuantityLowered
events.description: Facilitate reducing item quantities in the cart.

commands.name: AddItem
commands.description: New item addition to the cart for enhanced customer experience.

commands.name: RemoveItem
commands.description: Allow customers to easily remove items from their cart.

commands.name: ApplyDiscount
commands.description: Facilitate promotional discounts directly in the shopping cart.

commands.name: SaveCart
commands.description: Enable users to save their cart for later purchases.

commands.name: AddGiftOption
commands.description: Allow customers to mark items as gifts.

commands.name: LowerQuantity
commands.description: Facilitate reducing item quantities in the cart.

integrationPoints.name: PaymentService
integrationPoints.description: Integrate with Payment Service to process payments during checkout.

integrationPoints.name: InventoryService
integrationPoints.description: Integrate with Inventory Service to manage stock levels for cart items.

integrationPoints.name: ShippingService
integrationPoints.description: Integrate with Shipping Service for delivery options and tracking.
